name: QuickChart
natural_language_description: 这是 QuickChart 节点。主要用于: Create a chart via QuickChart

chartType.name: chartType
chartType.description: The type of chart to create
chartType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Chart Type | 作用: The type of chart to create | 默认值: bar

labelsMode.name: labelsMode
labelsMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Add Labels | 默认值: manually

labelsUi.name: labelsUi
labelsUi.description: Labels to use in the chart
labelsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Labels | 作用: Labels to use in the chart | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

labelsArray.name: labelsArray
labelsArray.description: The array of labels to be used in the chart
labelsArray.natural_language_description: 参数名: Labels Array | 作用: The array of labels to be used in the chart | (必填项)

data.name: data
data.description: Data to use for the dataset, documentation and examples here
data.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data | 作用: Data to use for the dataset, documentation and examples here | (必填项)

output.name: output
output.description: The binary data will be displayed in the Output panel on the right, under the Binary tab
output.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output In Field | 作用: The binary data will be displayed in the Output panel on the right, under the Binary tab | 提示: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in | 默认值: data | (必填项)

chartOptions.name: chartOptions
chartOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Chart Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: backgroundColor (值: None) - Background color of the chart
devicePixelRatio (值: None) - Pixel ratio of the chart
format (值: None) - File format of the resulting chart
height (值: None) - Height of the chart
horizontal (值: None) - Whether the chart should use its Y axis horizontal
width (值: None) - Width of the chart

datasetOptions.name: datasetOptions
datasetOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Dataset Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: backgroundColor (值: None) - Color used for the background the dataset (area of a line graph, fill of a bar chart, etc.)
borderColor (值: None) - Color used for lines of the dataset
fill (值: None) - Whether to fill area of the dataset
label (值: None) - The label of the dataset
pointStyle (值: None) - Style to use for points of the dataset
